title: Fragments With Partial Chef, "Telemachus and Calypso", ca. 1790
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate and by block on plain weave
markings:
A. "...J.P.Meille......Bordeaux Bon T...."
B. "...J.P. Me..."
C. "...Com, No 25..."
D. "...eaux Bon..."
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 28 x 17 cm (11 in. x 6 11/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 16 x 31.5 cm (6 5/16 x 12 3/8 in.)
Warp x Weft (c): 8.5 x 24 cm (3 3/8 x 9 7/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (d): 8.5 x 24 cm (3 3/8 x 9 7/16 in.)
description: Four fragments coming from the bolt end of this fabric. Each fragment has the partial markings of a chef on it.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments With Partial Chef, "Telemachus and Calypso", ca. 1790.
ca. 1790. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate and by block on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-347-a/d.
